subject: RE: [junit] assert and Java 1.4
msgSnippet: Mike I, junit 3.7, assert (.) has been replaced by assertTrue (.) Alain Ravet Brussels, Belgium ... De : Starkie, Michael [mailto:MStarkie@datek.com] Envoyé :
messageBody:
Mike

I, junit 3.7, assert (.) has been replaced by assertTrue (.)

Alain Ravet
Brussels, Belgium

-----Message d'origine-----
De : Starkie, Michael [mailto:MStarkie@...]
Envoyé : mercredi 19 septembre 2001 15:53
À : junit@yahoogroups.com
Objet : [junit] assert and Java 1.4


In Java 1.4 "assert" is a keyword and may not be used as an identifier,
therefore my regression test code fails to build when using java 1.4.
What is Junit going to do about it?

thanks,

mike
